channel.title: Garden on Tropical White Villages | Estate Agent
channel.description: Recent content in Garden on Tropical White Villages | Estate Agent

item.title: Large Villa Almunecar
item.description: €630,000 Large detached villa for same in Calle Hurtado de Mendoza, Almunecar. A fantastic opportunity to purchase a very spacious house in an unbeatable central position, with all services and the beach just around the corner. The house is currently divided into two living areas; A 2 bedroom apartment, living / dining room, kitchen and bathroom.

item.title: Terraced House, Almunecar
item.description: €284,000 Fantastic terraced house in Arroyo Marina II. 86M&#x33A1 $$ 86M^2 $$ Townhouse 3 Bedrooms Mountain Views Rooftop Terrace 2 Bathrooms In the heart of Salobrena and only 15 minutes to the beach. Don’t fill this out if you’re human: Ref: Email: Message: Send

item.title: Chalet Los Guajaras
item.description: €125,000 Stunning surroundings, located in an area of outstanding natural beauty. This pretty well furnished two-bedroom home with good ECO credentials is great for nature lovers, walkers and cyclists who want to escape to relaxing and peaceful surroundings to enjoy an average of 320 days of sunshine a year.
